mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewreply (review_no, reply, reply_id) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, #{reply}, #{replyId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.user_nick FROM reviewreply r JOIN users u ON r.reply_id = u.user_id WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo} ORDER BY reply_no DESC LIMIT #{paging.pageStart}, #{paging.cpp}
